title: All of Me
description: A snowed in ski chalet, a cup of hot cocoa, and Jason Powers...   If you liked Bared to You or Fifty Shades of Gray, you will enjoy this story!  The holidays are here and Jason surprises Sophia with a ski trip to Colorado. Sophia prepares for a romantic, private getaway between her and Jason, but is surprised to find that the trip is a group getaway with several friends. While being up in the mountains, Sophia and Ellie both become uncomfortably aware of the differences between them and their wealthy companions.  Will Sophia be able to turn this disastrous ski trip around and turn it into the romantic getaway she envisioned?   Note: This is the seventh instalment of the Billionaire Next Door series.
